0331634d-9148-405d-b3da-f5a2f351b06b.description: Graduates of The Florida Certified Public Manager® Program, learn the essential concepts and practices necessary for Transformational Leadership. Graduates complete the robust CPM curriculum consisting of 7 Levels/Topics of 4 experiential learning/training days each (31 full days), on leadership and management in the public sector.
0331634d-9148-405d-b3da-f5a2f351b06b.name: Florida Certified Public Manager

issuer.summary: issued by the Florida Center for Public Management at FSU

entity.name: the Florida Center for Public Management at FSU

alignments.name: Completion
alignments.description: Completion of the CPM program is equivalent to 2 3-credit hour courses at FSU.

alignments.name: Accreditation
alignments.description: FCPM is accredited through the National Consortium of Certified Public Managers.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 300 contact hours of experiential learning and training.
Submit 14 graded assignments and exams of 1200 words or more.
Complete a viable process improvement project.
Complete a capstone project involving a governmental policy presentation, complete with a Q&A critique, and feedback.
Create an executive development plan and have participated in a mini conference involving continuing professional growth and an examination of contemporary issues in public management.
